scenarios.name: Initial Member Validation
scenarios.description: First step of the process. Verify that the member exists and their policy was active on the date of service.

scenarios.name: Provider Validation
scenarios.description: Verify that the provider exists and is correctly configured.

scenarios.name: History Claims Extraction
scenarios.description: After initial validations, extract all historical claims for the same member to prepare for comparison.

logic.condition: History claims are found for the member

if_false.reason: No history claims found, therefore it is a new claim, not a duplicate.

scenarios.name: Core Service Information Comparison
scenarios.description: Compare key service details (POS, DOS, DX, units, CPT, provider, modifier) between the new claim and the extracted history claims.

scenarios.name: DCN Review for Same Service Information
scenarios.description: When all service info is identical, the claims are considered duplicates and the one processed first is paid.

logic.condition: This is the first claim processed

if_true.reason: All service information matched, and this was the first claim received.

if_false.reason: All service information matched, but this was the second claim received.

scenarios.name: Detailed Mismatch Adjudication
scenarios.description: Adjudicate the claim based on specific mismatches in service information, provider, or modifiers when core information is different.

logic.condition: Any of [POS, Charges, Units, Diagnosis, DOS] mismatch is true

if_true.reason: Mismatch found in core service information (POS, Charges, Units, Dx, or DOS).

scenarios.name: Provider and Modifier Mismatch Adjudication
scenarios.description: Final adjudication based on provider or modifier differences when core service info matches.

logic.condition: Provider Mismatch is true AND Provider Specialty is 'Different' AND Billing Group is 'Different'

if_true.reason: Provider mismatch allowed due to different specialty and billing group.

logic.condition: Modifier Mismatch is true AND Modifier is 'Payable'

if_true.reason: Modifier mismatch allowed because the new modifier is payable.
Claim denied due to unresolvable provider or modifier mismatch.
